manual_tags_dialog.title: [AT] Enter tags
manual_tags_dialog.text: [AT] Tags are separated by a comma or a line break. The # symbol is ignored

confirmation_dialog.text: [AT] Tags in the group will be replaced with the resulting tag in queries and company profiles
